resources.string: How can I improve the character recognition?
It\'s not perfect! Take your photos head on with consistent lighting.
What word list does Boggle Buddy use?
The North American Scrabble Players Association official 2018 word list.
What dictionary are the definitions coming from?
Boggle Buddy uses Merriam-Webster\'s Collegiate Dictionary API.
Search: Enter any word and I\'ll validate it against the North American Scrabble Players Association 2018 word list.
Populate: Type the 16 characters as a single word from left to right and top to bottom. I\'ll automatically convert "q" to Qu.
Camera: Take a picture of your Boggle board and I\'ll do my best to recognize all the characters. To help me out, I only ask that you use our cropping tool to isolate the board.
Solve: I\'ll find all the possible words and display them below.
